content: आरः, --रं [आ-ऋ-घञ्] {@--1@} Brass. {@--2@} Oxide of iron. {@--3@} An angle, corner. {@--4@} <ab>N.</ab> of a tree (मधुराम्रफल). --रः {@--1@} The planet Mars. {@--2@} The planet Saturn. {@--3@} Going. {@--4@} Distance. {@--5@} Nearness, as in आरात् <ab>q. v.</ab> {@--6@} Extremity (प्रांतभाग). --रा (आ-ऋ-अच्) {@--1@} A shoemaker's awl. {@--2@} A knife, probe, instrument of iron. {@--3@} A spoke; <ab>cf.</ab> अर. {@--4@} A goad, or whip; उद्यम्यारामग्रकायोत्थितस्य <ls>Śi. 18. 7.</ls>
